column18: estimated from Fig. 3. Rozzi writes that this may correspond to the caudal part of FvE area 7b (but definition is tricky) – not visual.

column17: Rozzi et al. (2006) – Cortical connections of the inferior parietal cortical convexity of the macaque monkey
column18: estimated from Figs 3, 8 and 14. according to Pandya and Seltzer (1982), PG and Opt are both parts of 7a. Rozzi writes that this may be the rostral part of 7a (but definition is tricky). I'm not sure how this is compatible with Max's scheme translation, where Pga corresponds to STPp and STPa. He also translates Ipa to STPp and STPa, but Rozzi et al. State that Ipa is ventral to STPa.
